title: All requirements regarding access, safety (including fire safety), ventilation, etc
clause_text: All requirements regarding access, safety (including fire safety), ventilation, etc. shall be complied with. All the planning standards (particularly as regarding parking) should be strictly adhered to. Other Requirements-Every basement shall meet the following specifications:

source_pdf.text_snippet: All requirements regarding access, safety (including fire safety), ventilation, etc. shall be complied with.
